verses.name: Luke 4:1
verses.text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,

verses.name: Luke 4:2
verses.text: Being forty days tempted of the devil. And in those days he did eat nothing: and when they were ended, he afterward hungered.

verses.name: Luke 4:3
verses.text: And the devil said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, command this stone that it be made bread.

verses.name: Luke 4:4
verses.text: And Jesus answered him, saying, It is written, That man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.
